column1: Smoque BBQ////The ribs (the larger St. Louis style) I love were great. Perfectly tender. There is this disgusting love for 'fall off the bone' ribs that makes people boil ribs to cook them then throw them in a smoker or on a grill. Boiled meat
column4: it's gotta be smoked and thiers are amazingly tender but not sodden. really good and served with the Memphis style BBQ sauce.
